title: New LP gas shipment arrives in Colombo
body_lines: Another shipment of 3,900 metric tonnes of LP gas arrived in Sri Lanka today (June 08), Litro Gas Lanka Limited says.
According to the company’s chairperson Vijitha Herath, the balance payment of USD 2.5 million will be settled before the unloading process begins.
This consignment of LP gas will be sufficient for six more days, Mr. Herath said further.
